elements.title: Perron of Liège (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Perron of Liège (pictured) was dismantled and removed by the duke of Burgundy, Charles the Bold, following a failed uprising?

elements.title: 1st Mechanized Infantry Brigade (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that shortly after the fall of Suharto, Indonesia's 1st Mechanized Infantry Brigade was deployed around the former president's house to protect him from mobs?

elements.title: Calum Lill (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the house of actor Calum Lill was used as a set for the drama Waterloo Road when he was a child?

elements.title: Interstate 155 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Interstate 155 is the only piece of surface transportation infrastructure that directly connects the U.S. states of Missouri and Tennessee?

elements.title: Lim Joo Hock (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Lim Joo Hock was called to the bar nearly two decades after getting his Bachelor of Laws degree?

elements.title: thirty of which originate in the country (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ukraine protects more than 3,000 geographical indications, only thirty of which originate in the country?

elements.title: Logan Barrio (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Logan Barrio is one of the oldest Mexican barrios in Santa Ana, California?

elements.title: Ethelwina (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the author of Ethelwina used Shakespeare to justify including a real ghost?

elements.title: a song about the discovery of sex toys and hundreds of condoms (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a song about the discovery of sex toys and hundreds of condoms from West End Girl recently became Lily Allen's first UK top-ten single since 2014?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

El Cuyo

El Cuyo beckons to visitors looking for a quiet, natural seaside town to bask in the sun undisturbed by revelers while other visitors seek adrenaline-pumping excitement.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

Dehydration

A condition that may affect travellers in many places and for many reasons. Never pleasant, sometimes fatal.
